about: Snigdha is a detail-oriented individual with a knack for problem-solving. She has previously showcased her excellence in delivering enterprise-scaled applications and has worked across numerous technologies in software development, focusing on creating microservices that process high-volume data. She has contributed to the holistic software development lifecycle of these APIs, beginning with the collection and definition of requirements, followed by architectural design, codebase development, rigorous testing, seamless deployment and meticulous documentation. She will be an asset to the team, being well-versed in Java, Spring Boot, DBMS, JavaScript, REST API development, and AWS services.
